            <string language="en">A votive statue offered by a civil servant of the Temple of Istar from Mari</string>

            <string language="hu">Mári,   ókor,   ókori Kelet,   Mezopotámia,   Kr. e. 25. század, fogadalmi,   vallás,  </string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une statue votive offerte par un fonctionnaire du

          <description>

          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
